extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • VoiceRecognizerDialog

        public VoiceRecognizerDialog(Context context,
                     int type)
        参数:
        context -
        type - -1：通用识别， 0：ABNF语法识别， 1：关键词识别/-1:Common recognition, 0:ABNF recognition, 1:Words list recognition
